text: Sergei Yuriyevich Vozovikov (April 17, 1958 – July 11, 1993) was a member of the Soviet Air Force Cosmonaut Training Group 11. His Cosmonaut training was to take place from October 1, 1991 to March 6, 1992. This was cut short when he drowned on July 11, 1993 during water recovery training in the Black Sea, near Anapa, Russia. David Shayler (June 2000). Disasters and accidents in manned spaceflight. Springer. p. 470. == Reference == Category:1958 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Russian cosmonauts Category:Space program fatalities Category:Deaths by drowning Category:Accidental deaths in Russia
title: Sergei Vozovikov
